taxon_identification.other_info_on_name: [For René-Théophile-Hyacinthe Laënnec, 1781–1826, French physician, inventor of the stethoscope]

bio:treatment.discussion: G. L. Nesom (1990) argued for segregating some species from Conyza as members of Laënnecia. Although there are exceptions to each of the trends noted by Nesom, the rationale he presented is compelling. R. D. Noyes and L. H. Rieseberg (1999) demonstrated molecular differences that are consistent with treating laënnecias and conyzas in separate genera; at the same time, they showed Conyza to be “nested” within Erigeron.

references.reference: Nesom, G. L. 1990. Taxonomy of the genus Laënnecia (Asteraceae: Astereae). Phytologia 68: 205–228.
